Title: The Doctor's Wife
Plot:
Location: In a bubble universe
Date: unknown
Enemies: The House, The Nephew

The Doctor receives a distress signal from an old friend. Could there really be another living Time Lord out there? Hopes raised, he follows the signal to a junkyard planet sitting upon a mysterious asteroid in a Bubble universe, populated by a very strange family, as the time-travelling drama continues.

The Doctor, Amy and Rory are given the warmest of welcomes by Auntie, Uncle and Nephew. But the beautiful and insane
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
GuestStars: Suranne Jones, Michael Sheen, Elizabeth Berrington, Daniel King, Adrian Schiller, Paul Kasey, Louise Bowen
